Issue.summary: As an MSP user I would like to enhance SatisfiesMSPPrincipal call with options
Issue.description: Within this item we target on enhancing MSPPrincipal validation function (SatisifesMSPPrincipal) with signature-based options. This would automatically enable us to support admin policies vs. admin identities within an MSP, and expose it to the developer leveraging MSP functionalities.
